segment.source: This topic shows you what you need to start programming DirectX games for the Universal Windows Platform (UWP).
segment.target: This topic shows you what you need to start programming DirectX games for the Universal Windows Platform (UWP).

segment.source: First, you need Visual Studio.
segment.target: First, you need Visual Studio.

segment.source: Get Visual Studio
segment.target: Get Visual Studio

segment.source: Download and install Microsoft Visual Studio 2015.
segment.target: Download and install Microsoft Visual Studio 2015.
